Easy 
---------------------
 Bodyweight Squats:

 Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
 Lower your body by bending your knees.
 Keep your back straight and chest up.
 Perform 2 sets of 12-15 reps.

Medium 
---------------------
 Lunges:

 Step forward with one leg and lower your hips.
 Both knees should be bent at a 90-degree angle.
 Push back up to the starting position.
 Do 3 sets of 10-12 reps per leg.e

Hard 
---------------------
 Barbell Back Squats:

 Place a barbell on your upper back.
" Squat down, keeping your chest up.
" Push through your heels to stand back up.
" Aim for 4 sets of 8-10 reps.

Easy 
---------------------
 Push-Ups:

 Start in a plank position.
 Lower your body by bending your elbows.
 Push back up to the starting position.
 Complete 2 sets of 10-15 reps.

Medium 
---------------------
 Dumbbell Bench Press:

 Lie on a bench with dumbbells in hand.
 Lower the dumbbells to chest level.
 Push them back up.
 Perform 3 sets of 8-12 reps.

Hard 
---------------------
 Barbell Bench Press:

 Lie on a bench with a barbell over your chest.
 Lower the barbell to your chest.
 Push it back up.
 Aim for 4 sets of 6-8 reps.

Easy 
---------------------
 Glute Bridges:

 Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
 Lift your hips towards the ceiling.
 Squeeze your glutes at the top.
 Do 2 sets of 15-20 reps.

Medium 
---------------------
 Bulgarian Split Squats:

 Stand a few feet in front of a bench or step.
 Place one foot behind you on the bench.
 Lower your body into a lunge position.
 Do 3 sets of 10-12 reps per leg.

Hard 
 ---------------------
Barbell Hip Thrusts:

 Sit with your upper back against a bench and a barbell across your hips.
 Lower your hips towards the floor and then thrust them up.
 Aim for 4 sets of 8-10 reps.

Easy 
 ---------------------
Jumping Jacks:

 Jump while spreading arms and legs.
 Return to the starting position.
 Complete 2 sets of 1 minute each.

Medium 
---------------------
 Burpees:

 Start with a squat, jump into a plank, do a push-up.
 Jump back to a squat and explode up.
 Perform 3 sets of 10 reps.

Hard 
---------------------
 Clean and Jerk:

 Lift a barbell from the ground to overhead.
 Combines a deadlift, a clean, and a shoulder press.
 Aim for 4 sets of 6-8 reps.
